title: Got kicked out of a game towards the end... can't get back in the game....
body:
So.... yeah title... relaunch the launcher... I can start a new game... but I can't get back into the game that's not even finished yet. 

Riot?

replies.body: was there a taliyah or karthus jungle in your game?
This reply seems like a joke, but I experienced that Tali bug in a game of mine... the one that also crashed the Echo Fox game. Have you guys hot fixed this yet or should we still be cautious?

yep, issue is now hotfixed (hotfix went out shortly after you experienced the bug><)

Let me know if something similar happens again and I'll look into it.

Is there a lengthier indepth post about what actually happened to caused that bug?

Very curious to see what caused it. Also, did Vandril's test actually help with anything?
Hello why i got a report i went to the game but hang in there they wanted to get me a report

There actually was a Taliyah jungler on the enemy team.

The match doesn't show up in my match history either. So I'm not sure if the game ever finished... but if it did I didn't want to be held liable for afk-ing when I had no opportunity to get back into the match.
